title: Lisa Curry's pregnancy workout
creator_credit: Carol Lloyd Corporate Theatre, Leigh Gower and Jeff Hogan
brief_description: The golden girl of Australian swimming, Lisa Curry presents this personal pregnancy workout program - a professionally planned and directed series of aerobic-styled exercises you can do each day in the privacy of your own home. Filmed in the Sunshine Coast waterfront home Lisa shares with husband, Grant Kenny - surfing “iron man” and Olympic canoeist -“Lisa Curry’s pregnancy workout” covers a wide range of pregnancy health and fitness topics of assistance to all expectant parents.
